content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The negotiation did not reach a successful conclusion. I was seeking a price of 1250 euros per month, but the potential tenant was only willing to offer around 800 to 900 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with this tenant in the future? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with this tenant in the future as a 2. The potential tenant's offer was far below my expectations, and I need to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. The conversation was conducted in a respectful manner.
name: Peter Schmidt
